BasicDescription.Title: The Disappearing Act
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Remarkable true story about a mother's investigation into her son's disappearance after he has a tempestuous affair with a successful career woman. Stars Patty Duke and Robert Floyd. W/S. [1998]

BasicDescription.Title: Skiing Weather
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A detailed weather forecast focusing on ski resorts.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News 24
BasicDescription.Synopsis: BBC ONE joins the BBC's rolling news channel for a night of news, with bulletins on the hour and the headlines every 15 minutes.

BasicDescription.Title: Breakfast
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Start your day with all the latest news, sport, business and weather from the BBC's Breakfast team. Includes regional news at 25 and 55 minutes past each hour.

BasicDescription.Title: Kilroy
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Robert Kilroy-Silk hosts topical debate and discussion with his studio audience. Followed by BBC News and Weather.

BasicDescription.Title: Ruby
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A lively mix of celebrity chat, audience discussion and studio mayhem with Ruby Wax. W/S. Then News and Weather.

BasicDescription.Title: Big Strong Boys
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Warfield Split Bedroom: If you're living in a decorating disaster zone, then the interior design cavalry are here! Jake Robinson and Gavin Lowe tackle DIY incompetence head on.

BasicDescription.Title: Trading Up
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Edgbaston: Design duo Colin McAllister and Justin Ryan are on the hunt for a home in Edgbaston for today's buyer. W/S. Followed by BBC News and Weather.

BasicDescription.Title: Cash In The Attic
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Sharples: Bill, a retired serviceman, has collected antiques for years. He now wants to move to a smaller home, so calls in the team to auction his treasures to raise �3000 for his new kitchen.

BasicDescription.Title: Wipeout
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Bob Monkhouse hosts the humorous general knowledge quiz where if you know the subject it's easy but if you don't, wipeout awaits.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest national and international news from the BBC this lunchtime, including Weather.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC London News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest stories from the BBC London newsroom.

BasicDescription.Title: Neighbours
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Tahnee continues to blackmail Nina, Michelle defies her parents and Summer goes to extremes to impress Max.

BasicDescription.Title: Diagnosis Murder
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Jake's Women: A bigamist is shot dead. The man's two wives are the prime suspects for the murder, but Dr Sloan soon discovers that there could have been other motives.

BasicDescription.Title: As Time Goes By
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Jean meets Lionel's father, an eccentric character with some rather surprising news.

BasicDescription.Title: Fimbles
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBeebies. Furry Material: Florrie finds something furry, and before long there is a Pom-cat in Fimble Valley, along with a very funny, very tickly, kitten!

BasicDescription.Title: Woody Woodpecker
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Woody's Ship of Fools/Bad Hair Day/Downsized Woody: More fun and hilarity with Woody Woodpecker and his pals Ms Meany, Wally Walrus, Buzz Buzzard, Chilly Willy and Winnie Woodpecker.

BasicDescription.Title: Mona The Vampire
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. The Baby Charmer: Mona is a ten year old girl who revels in the icky and eerie - when there's a ghoulish mystery to be solved she becomes Mona The Vampire!

BasicDescription.Title: Basil Brush
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Going For Broke: The famous Fox On The Box returns in his new comedy show with friends Molly and Dave and their hapless young uncle, Stephen.

BasicDescription.Title: Rugrats
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. And The Winner Is: Animated adventures in the world according to Tommy Pickles and his crew of toddling chums.

BasicDescription.Title: Blue Peter
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. The team reveals the Junior Sports Personality of the Year nominees. Cabbages and prizes are at the ready for another round of Double or Drop and it's the penultimate episode of The Quest.

BasicDescription.Title: CBBC At The Fame Academy
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Catch up with latest news and gossip from the Academy.

BasicDescription.Title: Newsround
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Daily news magazine keeping you up to date on the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest national and international news from the BBC. Includes a weather summary.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC London News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest stories from the BBC London newsroom. Followed by the national headlines and Weather.

BasicDescription.Title: A Question Of Sport
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Sports quiz hosted by Sue Barker, with team captains Ally McCoist and John Parrott. With special guests Matt Le Tissier, Nigel Benn, Ilie Nastase and Paula Radcliffe.

Sue Barker has the questions which Ally McCoist and Frankie Dettori will be seeking to answer, alongside four of the biggest names in sport.
On this evening's programme, Frankie teams up with the former Southampton and England footballer, Matt Le Tissier, and boxer Nigel Benn, the former world middleweight champion.
Joining Ally is one of the most gifted tennis players of all time who won the French and US Open titles, Ilie Nastase, and the British long-distance athlete who has enjoyed an incredible year, racing to Commonwealth, European and World titles as well as the marathon world record - Paula Radcliffe.
A special talent, Matt Le Tissier made over 400 appearances for Southampton and scored more than 200 memorable goals.
Nigel Benn was the WBC Super Middleweight Champion and WBO Middleweight Champion of the world.
Romanian tennis star Ilie Nastase was the first player to be ranked number 1 on the ATP tour back in 1973. He won the US Open in 1972 and the French Open in 1973. Often controversial and flamboyant, Nastase played to an adoring crowd at Wimbledon, where he twice finished runner-up in the Men's Singles.
In sporting terms, 2002 belongs to athlete Paula Radcliffe. She won the Commonwealth Games 5000m gold medal, the European Championships 10,000m title, the London and Chicago Marathons (the latter in a world record time), and the World Cross-country title.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: BBC Video: 30 Years of a Question of Sport

BasicDescription.Title: Top Of The Pops
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Big hits from the cream of the pop crop, with performances from Daniel Bedingfield, Atomic Kitten, Darius, Anastacia, Scooter, Alicia Keys, Ronan Keating and Lulu, and Enrique Iglesias.

BasicDescription.Title: EastEnders
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Laura is relieved when Ian finally accepts her pregnancy, Sonia gets some upsetting news from DCI Marsden, while Kat and Anthony become too close for comfort.

BasicDescription.Title: Fame Academy
BasicDescription.Synopsis: With only four students remaining, the pressure is on and the prize is within close reach. Who will impress the public? Who will impress the teachers? And who will get through to the final?

BasicDescription.Title: Have I Got News For You
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Another exciting round of the topical news quiz with prince of the put-down Ian Hislop and joker of the pack Paul Merton, plus special guest, Janet Street Porter.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News At Ten O'Clock
BasicDescription.Synopsis: National and international news, with reports from BBC correspondents worldwide.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC London News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest stories from the BBC London newsroom.

BasicDescription.Title: Friday Night With Jonathan Ross
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Jonathan provides his quirky take on the week's news stories and chats with his guests David Attenborough, John McEnroe, Laurence Llewellyn Bowen, Melinda Messenger and Supergrass.

BasicDescription.Title: Switchback
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Tense thriller starring Dennis Quaid as an FBI agent hot on the tail of the man who kidnapped his son. Also stars Danny Glover and Jared Leto. Contains strong language and violence. W/S. [1997]

Relentless FBI agent Frank LaCrosse has spent a year pursuing a serial killer who has kidnapped his son. Against the bureau's wishes, he vows to continue his deadly manhunt. When a series of murders occurs in his district, Sheriff Buck Olmstead find himself torn between winning re-election and helping LaCrosse stay on the trail of the killer. Their attention is focused on the tracks of a former railroad man and a mysterious young hitchhiker, one of whom may hold the secret of their search.
Stars Dennis Quaid, Danny Glover and Jared Leto. [1997]
